name: Clothes Horse, Inc.
description: Provider of online data-driven platform to help consumers to shop for clothing. The company provides a data-driven recommendations tool that recommends the best fitting clothes based on a shopper's body size and favorite past purchases.
one_liner: Provider of online data-driven platform to help consumers to shop for clothing. The company provides a data-driven recommendations tool that recommends the best fitting clothes based on a shopper's body size and favorite past purchases.
